Ape, Arrowhead, Bajarl, Baku, Beaclon, Centaur
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Techs/Tech Chains: Tech Values According To Tecmo Japan: Ape, Arrowhead, Bajarl, Baku, Beaclon, Centaur
By Lisa Shock on Thursday, March 21, 2002 - 11:47 pm:

I got ahold of the 2 Japanese strategy guides for MR2, and, while some things were changed for the US (like lifespans) I believe these figures hold. The numbers are simply presented, with no key, so I really have no clue as to the scale involved. This should at least be useful for comparing techs to each other, and should explain why some techs just don't work as well as others. For the time being, I am simply presenting the charts in the same order as the book.

Ape Techs

Tech NameForceHit %WitheringSharpness
SlapD 15A 8E 5- 0
SneezeD 5D -6C 36E 5
Swing-ThrowS 61D -10B 37D 10
ThwackC 20B 3E 5- 0
BlastC 16D -8B 43E 8
BoomerangD 15A 14E 8E 8
Grab-ThrowB 31D -11E 5E 5
Big BananaD 10S 18D 16E 8
Roll AssaultA 41D -9D 11E 5
BombC 22D -7D 10C 16
Big BombC 24B 1D 12C 18
Tasty BananaB 0E -25- 0- 0
